mapper.sql: a.id, a.code, a.name, a.type, a.parent_id, a.description, a.order_num, a.remarks, a.create_by, a.create_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_dict (id, code, name, type, parent_id, description, order_num, remarks, create_by, create_date, del_flag) VALUES (#{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{type}, #{parentId}, #{description}, #{orderNum}, #{remarks}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{delFlag})
mapper.update: update sys_dict set code = #{code}, name = #{name}, type = #{type}, parent_id = #{parentId}, description = #{description}, order_num = #{orderNum}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_date = #{updateDate} where id = #{id}
